mapper.select: select * from (select a.c_info_num, b.p_info_num, b.uniq_id_num, b.music_cat_code, c.music_cat_small, d.u_info from class_info a left join prof_info b on a.P_INFO_NUM = b.p_info_num left join music_cat c on b.music_cat_code=c.music_cat_code left join member d on b.uniq_id_num=d.uniq_id_num) where c_info_num=6
